LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up ReadySignOn authentication:

  • Create a new app on ReadyMembers of type confidential application. Please enter their access data in the form below.
  • Enter the URL listed below under ReadySignOn Login > Settings > Valid OAuth Redirect URIs.
  • Activate automatic registration in the shop's customer settings if you want to register externally authorized visitors automatically.

LocaleResource.Name: ClientKeyIdentifier.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter your client key identifier (App ID) here.

LocaleResource.Name: ClientSecret.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter your client secret (App Secret) here.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectUri.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The OAuth Redirect URI to be entered on Facebook.
